header.title: Start your journey as a seller on Doi
header.subtitle: Turn your products into profits through Doi's trusted and smart auctions.

steps.title: Simple steps to get started
steps.subtitle: Just three steps separate you from starting your selling journey

items.title: Activate your account as a seller
items.description: Review your data and identity and ensure their correctness.

items.title: Add your products
items.description: One product or a group of products, as you choose.

items.title: Start selling upon approval
items.description: Your ads appear to buyers and the process begins.
